Sentencas: Minimising the thermal gradients is extremely important in a planar solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) for improving the cell life.
Titulo: An adaptive non-linear observer for the estimation of temperature distribution in the planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The estimation of the temperature distribution in the cell is necessary to achieve this objective through suitable control, since they are not generally measurable.
Titulo: An adaptive non-linear observer for the estimation of temperature distribution in the planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In this work, we have designed a non-linear adaptive observer for estimating the temperatures inside the hydrogen fed planar SOFC.
Titulo: An adaptive non-linear observer for the estimation of temperature distribution in the planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The observer design is based on a lumped parameter model of the SOFC.
Titulo: An adaptive non-linear observer for the estimation of temperature distribution in the planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The stability of the proposed observer is proven using the Lyapunov function method and is based on the concept of input-to-state stability for cascaded systems.
Titulo: An adaptive non-linear observer for the estimation of temperature distribution in the planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The simulations show that the developed observer can track the temperature and species concentration profiles in the planar SOFC during step changes in the cell current.
Titulo: An adaptive non-linear observer for the estimation of temperature distribution in the planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The adaptive observer presented is valid for a wide operating range, requires fewer variables to be measured, and is robust to fluctuations in the inlet flows.
Titulo: An adaptive non-linear observer for the estimation of temperature distribution in the planar solid oxide fuel cell
